text:
‘Block Hafiz Twitter a/c’

Security agencies will approach Twitter India to block all accounts having links with Lashkar-e-Taiba founder Hafiz Saeed and Jamaat-ud-Dawa which are often found to be spreading venom against India. There are accounts which have links with the LeT’s front outfit, JuD, as well as terror mastermind Saeed and it has become necessary to shut them as quickly as possible, officials said. — PTI
title: Govt. to ask Twitter to block accounts with Hafiz Links
